work.name: Amazon Web Services
work.summary: Fall Internship at AWS Lambda assigned to improve Concurrency Limit Management Service to incorporate ARM workload when updating customer’s concurrency limit
highlights: Document technical Design Doc for planned updates on CLMS workflow and changes to its structure; and have it reviewed and approved for implementation

Implemented using Java, Dagger2 dependency injection, AWS Lambda, SQL query to Lambda internal metrics database, Continuous Integration/Deployment pipeline, pull requests with approved code reviews, load/stress testing, and unit testing via JUnit and Mockito framework

work.name: Encyclopædia Britannica
work.summary: Summer Internship at Britannica to research and develop better strategies to implement search engine and recommendation system
highlights: Setup Sphinx and Elasticsearch/Kibana search engines to improve article search on internal database

work.name: Wolfram Research
work.summary: Wolfram Alpha localization for the Korean language
highlights: Develop, test, and debug Korean NLP for W|A to correctly parse and calculate Korean queries
